body_html: return p.norm().reshape(1)? Is this feasible? The pytorch 0.4 has fixed the bug that pytorch 0.4 now can load the pre-trained model using weight_norm of pytorch 0.3. But When I use weight_norm in pytorch 0.4, the model still can not be trained using multiple GPUs.
body_text: return p.norm().reshape(1)? Is this feasible? The pytorch 0.4 has fixed the bug that pytorch 0.4 now can load the pre-trained model using weight_norm of pytorch 0.3. But When I use weight_norm in pytorch 0.4, the model still can not be trained using multiple GPUs.
body: return p.norm().reshape(1)? Is this feasible? The pytorch 0.4 has fixed the bug that pytorch 0.4 now can load the pre-trained model using weight_norm of pytorch 0.3. But When I use weight_norm in pytorch 0.4, the model still can not be trained using multiple GPUs.
